p: There is currently an outbreak of extensively drug resistant (XDR) typhoid fever in Pakistan where almost two-thirds of isolates from Sindh Province were resistant to all the recommended antibiotics for typhoid fever from November 2016 to December 2018. Six travel-associated cases of XDR typhoid were noted in international travelers who had visited Pakistan in 2018 [ 24]. This is a reflection of the worrying rise of antimicrobial resistance worldwide.
